title: [EPIC] Parallel Agent Execution
body:
## ðŸŽ¯ Epic

## ðŸ§© Market Gap
- **Devin**: Multiple cloud agents working in parallel

- Spawn up to 10 parallel agents

## ðŸ“Š Success Metrics

- <5% conflict rate
